means: 霍皮人（美国亚利桑那州东南部印第安村庄居民），霍皮人使用的语言

sentence.Network_en: Imagine that a museum has just acquired a Hopi Kachina doll.
sentence.Network_cn: 设想一个博物馆最近得到了霍皮印第安人的一个克奇纳神偶像.

sentence.Network_en: The Hopi people want it back because it is sacred to them.
sentence.Network_cn: 霍皮人想要回去,因为它对他们而言是神圣的.

sentence.Network_en: Once again, the Hopi present an interesting contrast.
sentence.Network_cn: 霍皮人再一次提供了有趣的对比.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “Anasazi”一词在霍皮语（hopi）（Hopi）中意为“这些古代人”。直到今天居住在Anasazi这一地方的霍皮人在社会制度和文化诸方面与他们的印 …
"霍皮族(HOPI)"印地安人的罹癌率就很低平均为1/1000 过去曾经有研究人员尝试将已到癌症末期, 且手术治疗无效的患者, 移居到中美 …
霍皮人（HOPI）—美国亚利桑那州东南部印第安村庄居民基督教（CHRISTAN）—正式名称是新教马耳他（MALTA）—地中海的岛 …

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the Shoshonean people of northeastern Arizona
2. the Shoshonean language spoken by the Hopi people

auth_sentence.content: "I am saddened to learn that the sacred Hopi cultural objects are being put out to auction in Paris today," he wrote.
auth_sentence.res_content: "I am saddened to learn that the sacred Hopi cultural objects are being put out to auction in Paris today," he wrote.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I am saddened to learn that the sacred Hopi cultural objects are being put out to auction in Paris today," he wrote.

auth_sentence.content: What the Hopi have said about this auction is that people don't understand their culture.
auth_sentence.res_content: What the Hopi have said about this auction is that people don't understand their culture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What the Hopi have said about this auction is that people don't understand their culture.

auth_sentence.content: The Hopi word of the title means "Life out of balance"; that's our own life, every day.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Hopi word of the title means "Life out of balance"; that's our own life, every day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Hopi word of the title means "Life out of balance"; that's our own life, every day.
